AT.name: Pokémon™ Omega Rubin
AT.description: In diesem Spiel spielt man als Trainer, der im Lauf seiner Abenteuer bei dem Versuch, das Land vor Team Magmas bösen Plänen zu retten, kleine Wesen namens Pokémon fängt, trainiert & mit ihnen zu Kämpfen antritt. Man kann Trainer-Champ werden, indem man andere Trainer bei Pokémon-Kämpfen besiegt, und auch Geheimbasen & Geheim-Freunde finden, mit denen man online oder über lokale Drahtlosverbindung Mehrspieler-Kämpfe austragen und tauschen kann.

AU.name: Pokémon™ Omega Ruby
AU.description: In this game, the player is a Trainer who captures, trains and battles small creatures called Pokémon, while adventuring to save the land from Team Magma’s evil plans. There is a chance to become the Champion Trainer by defeating other Trainers in Pokémon battles, plus Super-Secret Bases to find, and Secret Pals to make, which can be accessed online or over local wireless for multiplayer battles and trading.

BR.name: Pokémon™ Omega Ruby
BR.description: Sobrevoe a região de Hoenn em uma inesquecível aventura para se tornar o melhor treinador de Pokémon de todos os tempos. Ao capturar, batalhar e treinar uma variedade de Pokémon, você conseguirá novas megaevoluções poderosas. Procure por Pokémon lendários de regiões próximas e distantes enquanto desvenda os poderes secretos de Primal Groudon e Primal Kyogre! Os jogos Pokémon™ Omega Ruby e Pokémon Alpha Sapphire trazem a animação dos jogos clássicos de Pokémon Ruby e Pokémon Sapphire, agora totalmente reinventados e remasterizados, para explorar ao máximo as funcionalidades dos consoles Nintendo 3DS e Nintendo 2DS. Com novas megaevoluções de Pokémon antigos, novos personagens e histórias, novas áreas para explorar, novas formas de encontrar e capturar Pokémon e novas formas de viajar, estes jogos oferecem horas de entretenimento tanto para os fãs dos jogos atuais de Pokémon como também para os jogadores que estão apenas começando com as séries! Confira o tema inspirado neste jogo, na loja de temas. Basta tocar no ícone no canto superior esquerdo do menu HOME do seu Nintendo 3DS para começar.

BG.name: Pokémon™ Omega Ruby
BG.description: In this game, the player is a Trainer who captures, trains and battles small creatures called Pokémon, while adventuring to save the land from Team Magma’s evil plans. There is a chance to become the Champion Trainer by defeating other Trainers in Pokémon battles, plus Super-Secret Bases to find, and Secret Pals to make, which can be accessed online or over local wireless for multiplayer battles and trading.

BE.name: Pokémon™ Rubis Oméga
BE.description: Dans ce jeu, vous êtes un Dresseur qui capture et entraîne des Pokémon pour les mener au combat. Au fil de l'aventure, vous déjouez les plans machiavéliques de Team Magma. Vous pouvez devenir un Champion en vainquant d'autres Dresseurs dans des combats de Pokémon. Découvrez aussi de Super Bases Secrètes, et faites-vous des Amis secrets que vous pourrez retrouver en ligne ou en local pour des échanges et des combats multijoueurs.

CA.name: Pokémon™ Omega Ruby
CA.description: Soar high above the Hoenn region on an unforgettable quest to be the very best Pokémon Trainer. As you catch, battle, and train a variety of Pokémon, you’ll unleash powerful new Mega Evolutions. Seek out Legendary Pokémon from regions near and far while uncovering the secret powers of Primal Groudon and Primal Kyogre! The Pokémon™ Omega Ruby and Pokémon Alpha Sapphire games deliver the excitement of the original Pokémon Ruby and Pokémon Sapphire games, now reimagined and remastered from the ground up to take full advantage of the Nintendo 3DS and Nintendo 2DS. With new Mega Evolutions of past Pokémon, new characters and stories, new areas to explore, new ways to find and catch Pokémon, and new ways to travel, these games offer hours of entertainment for both current Pokémon fans and players just getting into the series! Check out the theme inspired by this game in the Theme Shop. Just tap the icon in the upper left corner of your Nintendo 3DS HOME Menu to get started.

CH.name: Pokémon™ Omega Rubin
CH.description: In diesem Spiel spielt man als Trainer, der im Lauf seiner Abenteuer bei dem Versuch, das Land vor Team Magmas bösen Plänen zu retten, kleine Wesen namens Pokémon fängt, trainiert & mit ihnen zu Kämpfen antritt. Man kann Trainer-Champ werden, indem man andere Trainer bei Pokémon-Kämpfen besiegt, und auch Geheimbasen & Geheim-Freunde finden, mit denen man online oder über lokale Drahtlosverbindung Mehrspieler-Kämpfe austragen und tauschen kann.

ES.name: Pokémon™ Rubí Omega
ES.description: En este juego, el jugador es un Entrenador que captura, entrena y combate contra unas pequeñas criaturas llamadas Pokémon, al tiempo que se aventura para salvar el mundo del maligno Equipo Magma. Podrá convertirse en Entrenador Campeón derrotando a otros en batallas Pokémon, encontrar Superbases Secretas y hacer Amigos Secretos (con los que se podrá contactar online o localmente para combates multijugador y la realización de intercambios).

FI.name: Pokémon™ Omega Ruby
FI.description: In this game, the player is a Trainer who captures, trains and battles small creatures called Pokémon, while adventuring to save the land from Team Magma’s evil plans. There is a chance to become the Champion Trainer by defeating other Trainers in Pokémon battles, plus Super-Secret Bases to find, and Secret Pals to make, which can be accessed online or over local wireless for multiplayer battles and trading.

Découvrez aussi de Super Bases Secrètes, et faites-vous des Amis secrets que vous pourrez retrouver en ligne ou en local pour des échanges et des combats multijoueurs.

There is a chance to become the Champion Trainer by defeating other Trainers in Pokémon battles, plus Super-Secret Bases to find, and Secret Pals to make, which can be accessed online or over local wireless for multiplayer battles and trading.

HK.name: Pokémon Omega Ruby(日文版)
HK.description: 本作裝飾在包裝上的Pokémon們是透過 「Primal Reversion(ゲンシカイキ)」，回到原來擁有強大力量的「Primal Groudon(ゲンシグラードン)」和「Primal Kyogre(ゲンシカイオーガ)」。 裝飾在『Pokémon Omega Ruby』包裝上的是「Primal Groudon(ゲンシグラードン)」，而在『Pokémon Alpha Sapphire』包裝上的是「Primal Kyogre(ゲンシカイオーガ)」。描繪在包裝上的Pokémon們將會在各自的故事中以重要的Pokémon登場！ ※此軟體為『Pokémon Omega Ruby』。部分劇情以及「Pokémon出現率」、「出現的Pokémon種類」等與『Pokémon Alpha Sapphire』不同。『Pokémon Omega Ruby』、『Pokémon Alpha Sapphire』、 『Pokémon X』、『Pokémon Y』、 『Pokémon Bank』間可進行通訊。※無法與其他Pokémon軟體或周邊設備進行通訊。 ※『Pokémon Omega Ruby』的遊戲語言可從日文、英文、意大利文、西班牙文、法文、德文、韓文中選擇。(不包含繁體中文，敬請見諒)軟體內建之電子使用說明書為繁體中文。

HR.name: Pokémon™ Omega Ruby
HR.description: In this game, the player is a Trainer who captures, trains and battles small creatures called Pokémon, while adventuring to save the land from Team Magma’s evil plans. There is a chance to become the Champion Trainer by defeating other Trainers in Pokémon battles, plus Super-Secret Bases to find, and Secret Pals to make, which can be accessed online or over local wireless for multiplayer battles and trading.

There is a chance to become the Champion Trainer by defeating other Trainers in Pokémon battles, plus Super-Secret Bases to find, and Secret Pals to make, which can be accessed online or over local wireless for multiplayer battles and trading.

HU.name: Pokémon™ Omega Ruby
HU.description: In this game, the player is a Trainer who captures, trains and battles small creatures called Pokémon, while adventuring to save the land from Team Magma’s evil plans. There is a chance to become the Champion Trainer by defeating other Trainers in Pokémon battles, plus Super-Secret Bases to find, and Secret Pals to make, which can be accessed online or over local wireless for multiplayer battles and trading.

IT.name: Pokémon™ Rubino Omega
IT.description: Ogni giocatore è un allenatore che nella sua avventura dovrà catturare, allenare e far lottare piccole creature, i Pokémon, per salvare la regione dai malvagi piani del Team Magma. Potrà diventare campione sconfiggendo in lotta altri allenatori Pokémon, scoprirà le Super Basi Segrete di altri giocatori e farà amicizia con nuovi amici segreti, con cui potrà comunicare online o in locale, per intraprendere battaglie multiplayer e scambiare Pokémon.

KR.name: 포켓몬스터 오메가루비
KR.description: 「포켓몬스터 오메가루비・알파사파이어」에서는 풍요로운 호연지방을 무대로, 대지와 바다를 오가며 메가진화의 수수께끼를 밝혀나가는 새로운 스토리가 펼쳐집니다. 패키지에 그려진 포켓몬,「원시그란돈」과 「원시가이오가」가 각각의 이야기를 움직이는 중요한 포켓몬으로 등장합니다. 이번 타이틀에서는 새로운 메가진화 포켓몬은 물론, 지금까지 본 적 없는 옷갈아입기 피카츄가 등장하고 자신만의「비밀기지」를 만들 수 있는 등 새로운 요소가 준비되어 있습니다.

JP.name: ポケットモンスター オメガルビー
JP.description: 『ポケットモンスター』シリーズは、プレイヤーが主人公となり、ポケモンという不思議な生き物たちとともに冒険を進める、RPGです。『ポケットモンスター オメガルビー･アルファサファイア』では、「メガシンカ」の謎に迫るストーリーが展開されるほか、「ゲンシカイキ」などの新要素も満載です。

movies.name: ポケットモンスター オメガルビー･ アルファサファイア 紹介映像
ポケモン オメガルビー･アルファ サファイア メガスペシャルアニメ

There is a chance to become the Champion Trainer by defeating other Trainers in Pokémon battles, plus Super-Secret Bases to find, and Secret Pals to make, which can be accessed online or over local wireless for multiplayer battles and trading.

Découvrez aussi de Super Bases Secrètes, et faites-vous des Amis secrets que vous pourrez retrouver en ligne ou en local pour des échanges et des combats multijoueurs.

MT.name: Pokémon™ Omega Ruby
MT.description: In this game, the player is a Trainer who captures, trains and battles small creatures called Pokémon, while adventuring to save the land from Team Magma’s evil plans. There is a chance to become the Champion Trainer by defeating other Trainers in Pokémon battles, plus Super-Secret Bases to find, and Secret Pals to make, which can be accessed online or over local wireless for multiplayer battles and trading.

MX.name: Pokémon™ Rubí Omega
MX.description: Navega a través de la región de Hoenn en una aventura inolvidable donde intentarás ser el mejor Entrenador Pokémon. Mientras capturas, combates y entrenas a una variedad de Pokémon podrás desatar la poderosa megaevolución. ¡Busca por Pokémon legendarios en regiones cercanas y lejanas mientras revelas los poderes secretos de Groudon Primigenio y Kyogre Primigenio! Los juegos Pokémon™ Rubí Omega y Pokémon Zafiro Alfa ofrecen la emoción de los juegos originales Pokémon Rubí y Pokémon Zafiro pero ahora han sido reinventados y remasterizados para sacar provecho total de las ventajas de las consolas Nintendo 3DS y Nintendo 2DS. Megaevoluciones de Pokémon pasados, nuevos personajes e historias, nuevas áreas por explorar, nuevas maneras de encontrar y capturar Pokémon y nuevas maneras de viajar hacen que estos juegos ofrezcan horas de entretenimiento para los seguidores nuevos y veteranos de Pokémon. Mira el tema inspirado en este juego en la tienda de temas. Simplemente toca el icono en la esquina superior izquierda del menú HOME de tu consola Nintendo 3DS para comenzar.

NO.name: Pokémon™ Omega Ruby
NO.description: In this game, the player is a Trainer who captures, trains and battles small creatures called Pokémon, while adventuring to save the land from Team Magma’s evil plans. There is a chance to become the Champion Trainer by defeating other Trainers in Pokémon battles, plus Super-Secret Bases to find, and Secret Pals to make, which can be accessed online or over local wireless for multiplayer battles and trading.

NL.name: Pokémon™ Omega Ruby
NL.description: In deze game speel je een trainer die kleine wezens met de naam Pokémon moet vangen, trainen en laten vechten. Ondertussen moet je het land behoeden voor de boze plannen van Team Magma. Je kunt kampioen worden door andere trainers in het gevecht te verslaan. Ook kun je je eigen geheime basis bouwen en geheime vrienden vinden, met wie je online of via een lokaal draadloos netwerk kunt vechten en Pokémon kunt ruilen.

NZ.name: Pokémon™ Omega Ruby
NZ.description: In this game, the player is a Trainer who captures, trains and battles small creatures called Pokémon, while adventuring to save the land from Team Magma’s evil plans. There is a chance to become the Champion Trainer by defeating other Trainers in Pokémon battles, plus Super-Secret Bases to find, and Secret Pals to make, which can be accessed online or over local wireless for multiplayer battles and trading.

PL.name: Pokémon™ Omega Ruby
PL.description: In this game, the player is a Trainer who captures, trains and battles small creatures called Pokémon, while adventuring to save the land from Team Magma’s evil plans. There is a chance to become the Champion Trainer by defeating other Trainers in Pokémon battles, plus Super-Secret Bases to find, and Secret Pals to make, which can be accessed online or over local wireless for multiplayer battles and trading.

PT.name: Pokémon™ Omega Ruby
PT.description: O jogador assume o papel de treinador para capturar, treinar e combater criaturas chamadas "Pokémon" enquanto tenta salvar a sua terra da malévola organização Team Magma. O jogador tenta tornar-se campeão derrotando outros treinadores em batalhas, com bases supersecretas para encontrar e companheiros secretos para fazer!

RU.name: Pokémon™ Omega Ruby
RU.description: Эта игра доступна только на английском, французском, итальянском, немецком и испанском языках. В этой игре вы играете за тренера, который ловит и тренирует малышей-покемонов, пытаясь спасти землю от коварных планов команды Магма. Вы сможете стать тренером-чемпионом, победив других тренеров в битвах покемонов, построить сверхсекретную базу и завести тайных друзей, с которыми можно будет сражаться и меняться покемонами как по Интернету, так и по локальной беспроводной сети.

SE.name: Pokémon™ Omega Ruby
SE.description: In this game, the player is a Trainer who captures, trains and battles small creatures called Pokémon, while adventuring to save the land from Team Magma’s evil plans. There is a chance to become the Champion Trainer by defeating other Trainers in Pokémon battles, plus Super-Secret Bases to find, and Secret Pals to make, which can be accessed online or over local wireless for multiplayer battles and trading.
